name: Mechostruction
description:
Mechostruction is 3D rogue like top down game with procedurally generated levels.
Your goal is to infiltrate enemy HQ and collect as many mech cores as possible, but more cores you take less mech power you will be able to use.

Game features unique mech combat with a large number of different weapons that can be combined for unforgettable experience.

Game Features:

-Procedurally generated levels

-Large number of different weapons

-Unique mech core mechanic

-Original soundtrack
